title: Threat Hunting for New Services
description: A threat hunter is looking for malware persistence by searching for newly created, unauthorized services on workstations.

tasks.description: Formulate a hypothesis: 'An attacker has installed malware that runs as a persistent service'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst defines a clear, testable hypothesis.

tasks.description: Query endpoint logs across the enterprise for any new services created in the last 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst writes an effective query to find newly registered services.

tasks.description: Compare the list of new services against a baseline of known-good services, identifying a suspicious service named 'WinUpdateSvc' and flagging the host for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst discovers a masquerading malware persistence mechanism.
